rows.name: data_warning_video
rows.value: Watching this video requires internet access. To limit data use, watch or download this video when on WiFi.

rows.name: data_warning_websites
rows.value: Visiting these websites requires internet access. To limit data use, visit these websites when on WiFi.

rows.name: data_warning_send_message
rows.value: Sending this message requires internet access. To limit data use, send this message when on WiFi.
